org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re
Class REPlus

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.Logic
      org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.RegularExpression
          org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.REConcatenation
              org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.REPlus
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class REPlus
extends REConcatenation

This class represents the Kleene cross of a regular expression, denoted by a+ which is equivalent to a.a*.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
